sentences.en: AbstractWith the development of market economy, accountancy becomes more and moreimportant.
sentences.cn: 市场经济越发展, 会计工作越重要.

sentences.en: Accountancy's ising machine - readable to turn is an accountancy development of inevitable direction.
sentences.cn: 会计电算化是会计发展的必然方向.

sentences.en: Alice found a job as a secretary in an accountancy firm.
sentences.cn: 爱丽丝在一家会计师事务所找到了一份秘书的工作.

sentences.en: An accountancy undergraduate would end up being an accountant.
sentences.cn: 会计系的毕业生会成为会计师.

sentences.en: At present, accounting information lacking fidelity is stillthe outstanding problem in accountancy.
sentences.cn: 目前, 会计信息失真仍是会计工作存在的突出问题.

sentences.en: Audrey was famous for her accuracy in accountancy.
sentences.cn: 奥德丽在会计工作中因精确而著名.

sentences.en: English is the international language of finance and accountancy.
sentences.cn: 英语是财务金融和会计的国际通用语.

sentences.en: He is studying accountancy or he is an accountancy student.
sentences.cn: 他正在学习会计学或他是一名会计专业的学生。

sentences.en: I contractjob and attended the accountancy of college to imitate process.
sentences.cn: 我承办并参加了学院的会计模拟流程.

sentences.en: Major in accountancy , associate degree . Apply for assistant of general manager.
sentences.cn: 会计学专业,大专, 应聘总经理助理.

sentences.en: Mazars will be Germany's eighth - largest accountancy firm.
sentences.cn: Mazars事务所将成为德国第八大会计事务所.

sentences.en: Singapore Accountancy Academy can offer very high quality of ACCA training course.
sentences.cn: 新加坡会计学院能提供非常ACCA培训班的高质量.

sentences.en: They had to do some creative accountancy to balance their accounts.
sentences.cn: 他们必须做假帐才能平衡帐目.

sentences.en: What is the nature of the Accountancy course which you are pursuing?
sentences.cn: 究竟你所读的会计科,是一种什么性质的?

sentences.en: Whether the enterprise environment is good or not has an effect on accountancy.
sentences.cn: 企业环境的优劣直接影响会计工作质量的高低。

sentences.en: With your head for figures, you should go in for accountancy.
sentences.cn: 既然你善于计算, 就应从事会计工作.

words.tran_cn: [会计]会计工作；会计学；会计师之职

trans.tran_en: the profession or work of keeping or checking financial accounts, calculating taxes etc
